## EquivMap class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EquivMap<K, V> extends Map<K, V> implements Iterable<Pair<K, V>>, ICopy<EquivMap<K, V>>, IEmpty<EquivMap<K, V>>, IEquiv 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(pairs, opts)](./associative.equivmap._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new instance with optional initial key-value pairs and provided options. If no <code>opts</code> are given, uses <code>ArraySet</code> for storing canonical keys and [equiv](./equiv.equiv.md) for checking key equivalence. |
